item.description:
Cutting-edge choreographer and dancer Rafaela Carrasco brings the Boston premiere of her prize-winning work Vamos al Tiroteo from Seville, Spain to the Flamenco Festival 2012 at the Cutler Majestic. Carrasco and her company of five dancers and live musicians perform to a number of classic tunes by Federico García Lorca, made famous by singer La Argentinita in 1931. One of her five full-length works, Vamos al Tiroteo won Carrasco two awards for best choreographer at the XV Flamenco Biennial of Seville.

Goldstar tickets are only $25! If you don't go through Goldstar they are $50.

Go to www.goldstar.com and then sign up, if not already a member. This is their featured deal until 2/29!!

Also posted with the Social Fun group. Let's all meet and have a good time!
item.name: Flamenco Festival: 2012
